details.title: Raise the Flag
details.description: Hang a US flag at home or draw one with your kids. Share a photo + what America means to you.

details.title: Show Gratitude
details.description: Handwrite a thank‑you note to someone who served you this week. Post a pic of the note (no addresses).

details.title: Pick It Up
details.description: Pick up 10 pieces of trash. Share before/after or your haul.

details.title: Pray and Post
details.description: Pray for someone by name and post an encouraging note (no private details).

details.title: Read the Bible
details.description: Read 5 minutes. Share one sentence about how it helped today.

details.title: Help at Home
details.description: Do a helpful job without being asked. Snap a quick photo that will inspire others.

details.title: Honor a Veteran
details.description: Thank a veteran or first responder. If they agree, post a photo + what you learned.

details.title: Call or Visit Family
details.description: Call/visit a family member. Share a photo or sentence about why they matter.

details.title: Listen Without Interrupting
details.description: Have a conversation where you listen to the end. Share one thing you learned.

details.title: Invite Someone to Church
details.description: Invite someone this week. If they come, share how it went (keep it kind).

details.title: Share a Verse
details.description: Pick a verse and post what it means to you. Tag 3 friends to do the same.

details.title: Thank a Teacher
details.description: Bring a small gift or note. Share the idea so others can copy it.

details.title: Family Table (No Screens)
details.description: Eat together with phones stacked for one meal. Share a family pic.

details.title: Three Generations
details.description: Grandparent + parent + child do an action together. Post a joyful photo.

details.title: Worship Playlist Share
details.description: Share 3 songs that lift your faith. Say why each matters.
